channel.title: Lubuntu on Rogier's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lubuntu on Rogier's blog

item.title: Installing OS on Cubietruck and SSD
item.description: Based on Robert Hekkers experience with installing the Cubieboard3, I downloaded the latest Lubuntu server OS v1.02 image: http://docs.cubieboard.org/tutorials/a20-cubietruck_lubuntu_server_releases I downloaded and installed the latest Phoenix Suite v1.06 for Windows using this download: http://docs.cubieboard.org/tutorials/common/livesuit_installation_guide After starting the Phoenix Suite, I was asked if I wanted to install the upgrade to v1.08. I clicked “yes”. (btw, DON’T install this software on a VM-ware virtual machine, I couldn’t get a stable connection to the Cubieboard3 and as a result the flashing would not start)
